lexUnit.definition: COD: a room or floor which is partly or entirely below ground level.

sentence.text: A neighbour sent for us to take shelter in a basement further along the street , and I was dragged along Arthur Street .

He never lost the affection and respect of the bank manager Fred Elt whose portrait he painted and with whom he occasionally dined at Elt 's basement flat in Gloucester Place , on one occasion taking Susan Einzig with him .
If only they 'd never left the basement with the empty meat-safe hanging outside the window .
My parents lived in the big house and I built a studio and had a whole little place where I could live in the basement and it was very convenient , so David would come round there . "

Between Piccadilly and Putney , where he lived in the basement of a decaying Victorian house , he progressed through his usual states of somnolence , sick juddering wakefulness , and increasing worry about Val .
I know that Russell lives in your basement and I am going to kill him .
Shelling had destroyed a wing of the building and 200 children were living in the basement .
That 's right , they lived in the basement .
I ca n't find out what 's going on while I 'm locked in the basement . "
We can lock ourselves in the basement , away from that bloody thing outside and until this Darkfall storm blows over . "

A local charity worker visited one of the hostels and found four old men sleeping in a basement " using a large baked bean tin as a chamber pot " .
She walked down a stone staircase to a basement where you could hang your coat .
He walked slowly back to the basement , nervous now .
As it was on such a steep gradient , a large basement was built under the rear end to give a level floor for the tracks .
There are restaurants and a Starbuck's in the basement , and you can access the raised pedestrian crosswalk from the escalators on the ground floor .

At about 8:30 ( eastern time ) firefighters were called to the home on 48 Granger Place to put out a fire that had started in the basement .
The fire started in the basement and spread to a small portion of the first floor .
Firefighters reported concern about a tower crane overhanging the building basement site .
